description:
The Magma is designed to hike, run annd scramble in all types of technical mountain terrain. It delivers a new level of grip and protection in a lightweight, comfortable shoe.

• Perfect individual fit
• All terrain grip and protection
• Downhill performance and shock absorption
name: Tecnica  Magma 2.0 S - Mens

specs.value: Compression molded EVA with high rebound compound
